text:

Even if you've been following Premier League football with only one eye open this season, it would have been impossible to miss David Luiz 's superb displays. 
The Brazilian completed a stunning return to Chelsea in the summer for Â£30million, leaving many dumbfounded. 
But it's the 29-year-old who's laughing now as a string of fantastic defensive displays have helped guide Chelsea eight points clear at the top of the table. 
Luiz also capped an already impressive season two weeks ago when he rifled in a fantastic free-kick against Liverpool. "Watch this, guys." (Photo: rubey_lcheek/Instagram) 
And now the centre-back is also impressing off the pitch. 
As seen in the footage above, courtesy of Ruben Lofus-Cheek, Luiz can be seen pulling off an outrageous swimming pool trick shot. "Swish." (Photo: rubey_lcheek/Instagram) 
In just a towel and flip flops, the Chelsea star perfectly kicks a football through a basketball hoop on the other side of the pool. 
Better still, Luiz walks off like an absolute boss. poll loading Has David Luiz been the best player in the Premier League this season? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
